title: BEL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 610 Trainee Engineer-I Posts
description: The Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 610 Trainee Engineer-I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, B.Sc. in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering, can apply for the BEL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
